欢迎使用 langchain-ChatGLM Web UI！

请在右侧切换模式，目前支持直接与 LLM 模型对话或基于本地知识库问答。

知识库问答模式，选择知识库名称后，即可开始问答，当前知识库新建知识库，如有需要可以在选择知识库名称后上传文件/文件夹至知识库。

知识库暂不支持文件删除，该功能将在后续版本中推出。
模型已成功加载，可以开始对话，或从右侧选择模式后开始对话
已加载知识库samples，请开始提问
你谁啊？
我是一个名为 ChatGLM2-6B 的人工智能助手，是基于清华大学 KEG 实验室和智谱 AI 公司于 2023 年共同训练的语言模型开发的。我的任务是针对用户的问题和要求提供适当的答复和支持。
你狠拽哦
抱歉，我的回答没有问题。如果您有其他问题，请随时告诉我。
唉我去！
您好，有什么问题我可以帮助您解答吗？
小BK ，能好好唠嗑不？
我是一个计算机程序，没有情感和感觉，只能通过算法和语言模型来回答您的问题。但是，我会尽力帮助您解答问题。请问有什么我可以帮助您解答的吗？
你会敲代码不？
我不会敲代码，因为我是一个计算机程序，也没有情感和感觉。我的主要目的是通过算法和语言模型来回答您的问题，而不是敲代码。如果您有关于编程或其他技术方面的问题，我会尽力帮助您。
生成一段贪吃蛇游戏的代码

很抱歉，由于我是一个计算机程序，我无法生成实际的代码。但是，我可以为您提供一个基于Python的简单贪吃蛇游戏的示例代码，您可以根据需要进行修改和扩展。

import pygame
import random

# 游戏界面的宽度和高度
WINDOW_WIDTH = 600
WINDOW_HEIGHT = 600


# 定义蛇的颜色和大小
SNAKE_COLOR = (0, 255, 0)
SNAKE_SIZE = 10


# 定义食物的颜色和大小
FOOD_COLOR = (255, 0, 0)
FOOD_SIZE = 10


# 初始化 Pygame 库
pygame.init()


# 创建游戏界面
window = pygame.display.set_mode((WINDOW_WIDTH, WINDOW_HEIGHT))


# 设置游戏界面的标题
pygame.display.set_caption(“贪吃蛇游戏”)


# 创建一个时钟对象
clock = pygame.time.Clock()


# 定义蛇类
class Snake:
def init(self):
self.x = WINDOW_WIDTH // 2
self.y = WINDOW_HEIGHT // 2
self.body = [(self.x, self.y), (self.x - SNAKE_SIZE, self.y), (self.x - 2 * SNAKE_SIZE, self.y)]
self.direction = “RIGHT”


<span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">draw</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">x</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">body</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">pygame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">draw</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">rect</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">window</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">SNAKE_COLOR</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">SNAKE_SIZE</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">SNAKE_SIZE</span><span class="p">))</span>

<span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">move</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">direction</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"RIGHT"</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="n">SNAKE_SIZE</span>
    <span class="k">elif</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">direction</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"LEFT"</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">-=</span> <span class="n">SNAKE_SIZE</span>
    <span class="k">elif</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">direction</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"UP"</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">-=</span> <span class="n">SNAKE_SIZE</span>
    <span class="k">elif</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">direction</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"DOWN"</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="n">SNAKE_SIZE</span>

    <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">body</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">insert</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">y</span><span class="p">))</span>
    <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">body</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">pop</span><span class="p">()</span>

    <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">x</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">body</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]:</span>
    <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">y</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">body</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]:</span>

    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">0</span> <span class="ow">and</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">body</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">y</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">direction</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">"RIGHT"</span>
    <span class="k">elif</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="n">WINDOW_WIDTH</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">SNAKE_SIZE</span> <span class="ow">and</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">body</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">y</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">direction</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">"LEFT"</span>
    <span class="k">elif</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">0</span> <span class="ow">and</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="n">WINDOW_HEIGHT</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">SNAKE_SIZE</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">body</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">y</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">direction</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">"UP"</span>
    <span class="k">elif</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="n">SNAKE_SIZE</span> <span class="ow">and</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">body</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">y</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">direction</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">"DOWN"</span>

    <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">body</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sort</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">grow</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">body</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">y</span><span class="p">)</span>



# 定义食物类
class Food:
def init(self):
self.x = random.randint(0, WINDOW_WIDTH - FOOD_SIZE)
self.y = random.randint(0, WINDOW_HEIGHT - FOOD_SIZE)


<span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">draw</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="n">pygame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">draw</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">rect</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">window</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">FOOD_COLOR</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">y</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">FOOD_SIZE</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">FOOD_SIZE</span><span class="p">))</span>

<span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">eat</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">self</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">snake</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="n">snake</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">x</span> <span class="ow">and</span> <span class="bp">self</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="n">snake</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">y</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">snake</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">grow</span><span class="p">()</span>
        <span class="k">return</span> <span class="kc">True</span>
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="kc">False</span>



# 创建一个蛇对象和食物对象
snake = Snake()
food = Food()


# 游戏循环
running = True
while running:
# 处理游戏事件
for event in pygame.event.get():
if event.type == pygame.QUIT:
running = False
elif event.type == pygame.KEYDOWN:
if event.key == pygame.K_LEFT:
snake.direction = “LEFT”
elif event.key == pygame.K_RIGHT:
snake.direction = “RIGHT”
elif event.key == pygame.K_UP:
snake.direction = “UP”
elif event.key == pygame.K_DOWN:
snake.direction = “DOWN”


<span class="c1"># 让游戏有一个帧速率</span>
<span class="n">clock</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">tick</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># 判断蛇是否吃到了食物</span>
<span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">food</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">eat</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">snake</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="n">food</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Food</span><span class="p">()</span>
    <span class="n">snake</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">grow</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="c1"># 绘制背景</span>
<span class="n">window</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">fill</span><span class="p">((</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">))</span>

<span class="c1"># 绘制食物</span>
<span class="n">food</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">draw</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="c1"># 绘制蛇</span>
<span class="n">snake</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">move</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">snake</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">draw</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">snake</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">body</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="n">snake</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">body</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">snake</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">body</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>

<span class="c1"># 更新界面</span>
<span class="n">pygame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">display</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update</span><span class="p">()</span>



# 关闭 Pygame
pygame.quit()

请注意，此代码仅用于学习目的。实际上，编写一个完整的贪吃蛇游戏需要更多的代码和技术，而且需要了解如何处理用户输入和移动蛇以及食物。
你知道北京镁伽科技吗？

镁伽科技（MgTech）是一家位于北京的国家级众创空间，致力于为创业者提供全方位的科技服务。镁伽科技主要围绕人工智能、物联网、大数据、云计算、机器人技术、虚拟现实等前沿技术展开，通过培训课程、技术咨询、融资对接等手段，帮助创业者实现项目的商业化运作。

镁伽科技还运营着一个名为“镁伽创客空间”的线下孵化器和加速器，为创业者提供办公场地、投资对接、宣传推广等支持。此外，镁伽科技还与多家知名高校、科研院所和行业机构合作，为创新创业项目提供技术支持。
你知道北京镁伽机器人有限公司吗
抱歉，根据我的知识库，北京镁伽机器人有限公司似乎没有公开的信息。请问您需要了解哪方面的信息呢？
共享盘路径抓取，并通过图号匹配文件方案POC，根据这些内容生成一个方案

基于共享盘路径抓取和文件方案POC，可以生成一个用于文件存储和访问的方案。以下是一个简单的方案设计：

1. 系统架构：

搭建一个基于共享盘路径抓取和文件方案POC的系统，包括客户端（用户端）和服务端（服务器端）。客户端通过Web界面或API接口访问共享盘路径和文件方案POC服务。

1. 功能模块：

1.1 共享盘路径抓取：

通过网络爬虫抓取指定共享盘路径下的文件，并存储到服务器端的临时文件夹中。

1.2 文件方案POC：

针对抓取到的文件，根据文件名、文件类型等生成相应的POC方案，并存储到服务器端的文件夹中。

1.3 文件存储与访问：

用户通过客户端上传生成的POC方案文件，并根据POC方案文件中的内容生成文件链接。用户可以点击链接获取文件内容，也可以将文件链接分享给他人。

1.4 用户管理：

用户可以通过客户端注册和登录，设置自己的权限和角色。根据用户角色，系统可以提供不同的功能和权限。

1.5 系统设置：

管理员可以对系统进行设置，如修改共享盘路径、调整POC方案等。

1.6 数据统计与分析：

系统可以对用户的操作数据进行统计和分析，以便于优化系统功能和提高用户体验。

1.7 日志记录：

系统会记录用户的操作日志，以便于追踪和分析用户行为。

2. 技术实现：

2.1 前端开发：使用HTML、CSS、JavaScript等技术实现用户界面。

2.2 后端开发：使用PHP、Java、Python等语言实现服务器端逻辑。

2.3 数据库：使用MySQL、Oracle等数据库存储用户信息、POC方案和文件数据。

2.4 网络通信：使用HTTPS或HTTP等协议实现客户端和服务器端的通信。

3. 部署与运行：

将系统部署到云服务器，并进行运行和测试。在测试过程中，不断收集用户反馈和优化系统功能。

这个方案只是一个简单的文件存储和访问系统设计，具体的实现细节可以根据实际需求进行调整。
